Margaret Webber

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: John and Elizabeth Bergman
  3. Location of Family: Plattsmouth, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Kansas City, MO
  6. Age on Arrival: 8
  7. Date of Birth: 1913-06-07
  8. Date of Death: 1998-06-12
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Margaret Weber
  11. Spouse Name: Joseph Weber
  12. Source: 1930 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex; Plattsmouth Journal 18 June 1998 - obituary for Margaret Weber.
